Name: HIT
About the game: This is the first project by EP4.As a newcomer to the gaming industry, I present you with the game I made to kill time while you waiting anything or anyone. The game was created as a car simulator. In subsequent updates, new cars will also be added to the map and the open world, physics will get a new character similar to real life, optimization will also be made in updates. The gameplay begins with a garage from which you need to leave and move in search of entry into the mountainous area, having overcome the mountainous area, namely, having made a circle through the mountainous area, you need to return. In the next update, after completing the mission, you will have access to a map that leads to another town. All controls, buttons are listed below Purchasing this product, you receive weekly gameplay updates as well as many interesting missions and tasks (will be added after the first update) Having bought this product, you will watch how the game will reach new heights and also add all the wishes of buyers Do not judge strictly if there are any ideas write to the contact address UP,LEFT ARROW,RIGHT ARROW,DOWN -Classic controls, Enjoy playing and spending time All errors,updates and others will be in next 4 months. Have a nice time in HandleIT
